column5: Our new MSc Marketing Analytics gives you the opportunity to gain specialisation in data analytics with a core knowledge in digital marketing. It is designed to offer you a blend of technical, quantitative modules in data analytics, alongside more technical marketing, social media and branding modules that will develop your ability to apply data analytics and technology to related digital marketing practices and real-world examples.To enhance your skills and in-depth knowledge in this area, we provide you with practical sessions on data analytics, simulation and other statistical data analysis exercises using:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
